text: @MeaslesRubellaPartnership is doing incredible work in preventing an estimated 57 million deaths from measles between 2000-2022! Their efforts, alongside @WHO, @GaviAlliance, @CDCgov, and other int'l partners are a testament to the power of collaboration in achieving public health goals. Let's keep up the momentum and ensure every child has access to life-saving vaccines! ðŸ’‰ðŸŒŽ
